title: The Jan 6 Prosecutions: Justice at the Breaking Point
description:
Scott MacFarlane, Investigative Reporter at NBC4, Washington, is the nation's "go-to guy" for the deepest details on developments and defendants in the Jan 6 investigation. Now, MacFarlane reads the writing on the wall to reveal where this all might be headed.

Follow Scott MacFarlane:
https://twitter.com/MacFarlaneNews
https://www.nbcwashington.com/author/scott-macfarlane/

Follow Frank Figliuzzi:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1

Please help us get to know our listeners better:
http://survey.podtrac.com/start-survey.aspx?pubid=BffJOlI7qQcF&ver=short



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
